page.title: 04BROUGHTON
page.content: have a bigger shopping centre, as the present one is not in the centre of Broughton.The majority of the population live to the north east of the shopping area . There is also a hospital at Broughton which provides facilities for mentally handicapped children. This facility is not going to be extended for at least ten years. The community is also served by a doctor who is located on the main road.There are also two schools, an infants school which has two hunderd and fifty pupils and a junior school which has three hundred and twenty pupils.On the whole Broughton has the advantages of being accessible, with enough new housing to meet the increase in poulation.However there are few opportunities for employment. At the present moment there are enough facillities for the population.
